scripts.build: (cd server && npm run build) && (cd gui && npm run build)
scripts.build-watch: (cd server && npm run build-watch) & (cd gui && npm run build-watch)
scripts.clean: (cd server && npm run clean) && (cd gui && npm run clean)
scripts.install-all: npm install && (cd server && npm install) && (cd gui && npm install)
scripts.deploy: npm run pkg-clean && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run pkg
scripts.test: (cd test && make test) && npm run lint
